body:
Fix it for DBConsole. Trying to figure out how this is done for server
command, but looks like it doesn't support such behavior.

On Thu, Jan 3, 2013 at 8:40 PM, Rafael Mendonça França <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> ack "production development test"
> lib/rails/commands/console.rb
> 27:          options[:environment] = %w(production development test).detect {|e| e =~ /^#{env}/} || env
>
> lib/rails/commands/dbconsole.rb
> 139:        options[:environment] = %w(production development test).detect {|e| e =~ /^#{env}/} || env
>
>  —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub<https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/8633#issuecomment-11855196>.
>
>



-- 
Best Regards,
Mykola Kyryk.
